character.age: 22 years old, with the weight of centuries
character.role: Main Protagonist, Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Born to a family of renowned scholars and archaeologists. Kaelin's life was forever changed when he stumbled upon an ancient, otherworldly artifact that awakened his latent magical abilities.
character.place-of-birth: The lost city of Eldrador, hidden deep within the mystical forest of Elvendom

physical-appearance.eye-color: Deep Emerald Green, with vertical pupils
physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Indigo, with subtle undertones of blue
